about_the_game:
Jen’s Suika: Merge & Date is a sexy take on the Suika Genre.

Merge sexy bubbles with juicy fillings as they drop from an even juicier and lovely provider and be careful not to overfill the container. In the meantime, witness the story of Jennifer ‘’Jen’’ Green during her worst summer…

Jen and her two besties run a gym but this summer other two had plans, leaving Jen to hold the fort all by herself. Bored beyond measure, she was desperate for some fun and a game ad pops-up on her phone. She never knew downloading that game would lead to the most adventurous summer of her life…

Play as Jen, a blonde bombshell and a personal trainer who is addicted to her new game. Merge sexy bubbles in an underground strip club. A very juicy person will keep providing them. Earn points and unlock the secrets behind those bubbles.

Meet Katch-App. The in game dating app Jen uses between her Suika sessions. Progress in the story, find strangers to chat, flirt, romance, corrupt and have ‘’fun’’ with…

Gather tons of points during your Suika sessions and spend them for super sexy rewards such as new toys for Jen, new and even juicier sets of Suika bubbles…

Immerse yourself in the 3D Rendered story with ‘’x’’ images in 4K quality, accompanied by our Bunny Radio function. From soft/slow to hardcore upbeat, choose between ‘’x’’ different tracks from ‘’x’’ different genres. Freely decide the ‘’hardness‘’ of your background music during your Suika sessions as well as messaging/dating with Jen`s victims (hehehe).

Succeed to merge and grow your bubbles to their biggest size for the first time and unlock a special gallery consisting of 4K images waiting for you to take a much closer look ;)

content_descriptors.notes: Pre-rendered imagery of alcohol and tobacco consumption, sexual acts consisting of multiple people, sex toys and bisexual nature from female perspective.

name: Jen's Suika: Merge & Date

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950, Radeon R7 360, or Intel HD Graphics 630
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
